TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MetadataKey extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types and taken as a parameter of the , , and members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Album = int32(1)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the information about the album title of the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Albumartist = int32(13)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the information about the performers or artist associated with the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Artist = int32(2)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the information about the artist of the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Author = int32(3)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the information about the author of the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Bitrate = int32(20)

summary.para: This key retrieves the average bitrate (in bits/sec), if available.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey CdTrackNumber = int32(0)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the numeric string describing the order of the audio data source on its original recording.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Compilation = int32(15)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the music album compilation status.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Composer = int32(4)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the information about the composer of the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Date = int32(5)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the date when the data source was created or modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey DiscNumber = int32(14)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the numberic string that describes which part of a set the audio data source comes from.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Duration = int32(9)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the playback duration of the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Genre = int32(6)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the content type or genre of the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey HasAudio = int32(16)

summary.para: If this key exists the media contains audio content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey HasVideo = int32(17)

summary.para: If this key exists the media contains video content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Location = int32(23)

summary.para: This key retrieves the location information, if available. The location should be specified according to ISO-6709 standard, under a mp4/3gp box "@xyz". Location with longitude of -90 degrees and latitude of 180 degrees will be retrieved as "-90.0000+180.0000", for instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Mimetype = int32(12)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the mime type of the data source. Some example mime types include: "video/mp4", "audio/mp4", "audio/amr-wb", etc.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey NumTracks = int32(10)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the number of tracks, such as audio, video, text, in the data source, such as a mp4 or 3gpp file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Title = int32(7)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the data source title.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey VideoHeight = int32(19)

summary.para: If the media contains video, this key retrieves its height.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey VideoRotation = int32(24)

summary.para: This key retrieves the video rotation angle in degrees, if available. The video rotation angle may be 0, 90, 180, or 270 degrees.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey VideoWidth = int32(18)

summary.para: If the media contains video, this key retrieves its width.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Writer = int32(11)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the information of the writer (such as lyricist) of the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.MetadataKey Year = int32(8)

summary.para: The metadata key to retrieve the year when the data source was created or modified.
